message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this item for sale at $230. It's a great deal!
I'm interested in the product, but $230 is a bit steep for me. I'm willing to pay $120 for it.
Thanks for your interest, Bob. I appreciate your offer, but I can't go lower than $180. This product is in high demand.
I understand the product is in high demand, but I'm still a bit hesitant to pay $180. I'm willing to pay $140 for it.
